name: Remote Access
description:
Your Robotics workshop has been hacked, you cant connect to the main network and due to the pandemic you cant go there either; You are Out Of Control. Luckily you built your bots with an active listener now you must use them to take back your lab (remotely)

Note : Negative values in commands work too.

Bugs:

  • After connecting to all bots press the execute button to progress to next level.
  • If you're out of battery and/or no bots are connected press the execute button to restart level.
  • Can't Progress to level 5 i.e. level 4 is Last level.

PS:Unfinished game due to bad time management skills.
